tool_description: Get Stats, Matches and Leaderboards from Trackmania (Unofficial).
title: Trackmania

api_list.name: In-game Ads
api_list.description: All currently active Maniapubs displayed in-game.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trackmania.p.rapidapi.com/ads"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trackmania.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Player Cup of the Day Information
api_list.description: Get the COTD info of a player.

required_parameters.name: player_id
required_parameters.description: The Account ID of the Player. Can be obtained using the `/players` endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The result limit that gets returned. Default limit is `50`.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The result page, each containing 50 results. Default page is `0`.

api_list.name: Player Trophy Information
api_list.description: Get the trophy info of a player.

required_parameters.name: player_id
required_parameters.description: The Account ID of the Player. Can be obtained using the `/players` endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The result limit that gets returned. Default limit is `50`.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The result page, each containing 50 results. Default page is `0`.

api_list.name: Player Summary
api_list.description: Get the summary of a player containing general information.

required_parameters.name: player_id
required_parameters.description: The Account ID of the Player. Can be obtained using the `/players` endpoints.

api_list.name: Sponsor Players
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trackmania.p.rapidapi.com/players/sponsor"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trackmania.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search all Players

required_parameters.name: search_query
required_parameters.description: Search query used in the search. Has to be at least `4` characters.

api_list.name: TOTD Tracks by Date
api_list.description: Get the TOTD tracks by date containing the year and month.

api_list.name: TOTD Tracks by Page
api_list.description: Get the TOTD tracks by page number of the `https://trackmania.io/#/totd` page.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The result page, each containing 50 results. Default page is `0`.
